title: 189. How to Fix a Broken High Schooler, in Four Easy Steps
description: Okay, maybe the steps aren’t so easy. But a program run out of a Toronto housing project has had great success in turning around kids who were headed for trouble.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
